t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Apt2B Lexington Reversible Chaise Sofa, Green Apple
s: I purchased my Lexington Reversible Chaise Sofa in Navy directly from Apt2B. I ordered in January and took delivery on February 2nd. It is beautiful. It is a bit firm, but that is to be expected with a brand new sofa. As I use it it will adjust to a comfortable but supportive sit.
